abstract: Indianapolis Colts, a model of stability and success in the NFL for 12 years with Peyton Manning as their quarterback, have fallen apart without him; Colts had won at least 10 games for nine consecutive years before Manning’s neck injury; this year they are 0-7.
snippet: The Colts had won at least 10 games for nine consecutive years before quarterback Peyton Manning’s neck injury; this year they are 0-7.
lead_paragraph: The Colts had won at least 10 games for nine consecutive years before quarterback Peyton Manning’s neck injury; this year they are 0-7.

headline.main: Life Without Manning Leads to Thoughts of Life Beyond Him
headline.print_headline: Life Without Manning Leads To Thoughts of Life Beyond Him
headline.seo: Without Him, Colts Make Manning Seem Underrated
